== Introduction ==
The Ubuntu Derivative for tablet pc's based on Xubuntu, it will come with a Calibration utility, Mypaint, and other tools for using with a tablet PC. (Under Planning)
Its made especially for tablet pc's.

== Contact Information ==
You can contact me (Dawnbandit) at dawnbandit@linuxmail.com and the Launchpad is https://launchpad.net/tabuntu1/ the irc chat is irc://irc.foonetic.net/tabuntu and the sourceforge page http://sourceforge.net/projects/tabuntuos/

== Audience ==
Tablet PC Users.
  

== Goals ==
To provide a specialised Ubuntu experience for Tablet PC Users.
